sentences.en: An osmotic mutant of Neurospora was permeable to polymers of molecular weight 18500.
sentences.cn: 脉孢壳属的渗透突变体能透过分子量为18500的聚合物.

sentences.en: By using the complementation test an unknown mutant can be rapidly assigned to a particular gene.
sentences.cn: 采用互补测验可迅速地将某一未知突变型归属于某一特定基因.

sentences.en: Conclusion Expression clone of human insulin mutant is successfully constructed.
sentences.cn: 结论成功地构建了人胰岛素突变体的融合表达体系,为进一步的研究奠定了基础.

sentences.en: CYP 450 gene has several mutant alleles leading to genetic polymorphisms in humans.
sentences.cn: 细胞色素P450氧化酶的基因具有遗传多态性,在人类存在等位基因的突变体.

sentences.en: Further, microbes have marked adaptability, and mutant species can be induced artificially.
sentences.cn: 进一步, 微生物标记了伸缩性, 并且可以人为地导致突变体种类.

sentences.en: Inhibition of chlorophyll synthesis may be caused by etiolation, mutant blocks, or streptomycin.
sentences.cn: 叶绿素合成可以由黄化 、 突变性阻塞或链霉素而引起.

sentences.en: New species are merely mutants of earlier ones.
sentences.cn: 新物种不过是早先物种的突变体。

sentences.en: Objectives: to study fermentation conditions of chymosin from mutant strain Mucor pusillus.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究微小毛霉产凝乳酶的固体发酵条件.

sentences.en: She's played a Bond girl, a mutant and a catwoman.
sentences.cn: 她扮演过邦德女郎, 变异人和猫女.

sentences.en: Site - directed mutagenesis can correctly change the base sequence and get mutant proteins.
sentences.cn: 基因定点突变技术可以精确地改变基因的特定碱基序列,获得突变蛋白质.

sentences.en: So the researchers turned to mutant mice with cells that lacked cilia.
sentences.cn: 因此,研究者转向研究缺乏纤毛的突变异种老鼠的细胞.

sentences.en: The long - term consequences of the mutant viruses are not yet known.
sentences.cn: 但突变病毒的 长期 结果目前还无法预测.

sentences.en: The mutant holds onto its leaves longer than the wild type.
sentences.cn: 突变体比野生型不易落叶.

sentences.en: Then we use free function mutate ( mutant ) to get the view.
sentences.cn: 然后我们用普通函数mutate ( mutant ) 来获得视图.

sentences.en: When the cells were then shifted to an enriched medium, the mutant cells proliferated.
sentences.cn: 然后,当细胞移入一种滋养培养液时, 突变型细胞增殖.

sentences.en: You realize the impact this'll have on the mutant community?
sentences.cn: 你意识到了这会对变种人族造成多大冲击 么 ?

words.tran_cn: 易变性；性情不定；突变性
诱导有机体突变的物质

phrases.tran_cn: 突变系；突变菌株；突变株
忍者神龟（美国动画电影）

trans.tran_cn: 突变的，变异的，变异所引起的，经过突变的
突变体，突变异种，变种生物，突变
trans.tran_en: an animal or plant that is different in some way from others of the same kind, because of a change in its  genetic  structure
